mapper.select: SELECT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] selectUser */ USR_ID, USR_NM, PASSWORD, ENABLED FROM TB_ADM_USR
SELECT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] getUser */ USR_ID, USR_NM, PASSWORD, ENABLED FROM TB_ADM_USR WHERE USR_ID = #{userId}
SELECT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] selectUserAuthority */ USR_ID as userId, ATH_CD as authCode FROM TB_ADM_USR_ATH WHERE USR_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* [user/user-mapper.xml] updateUser */ TB_ADM_USR SET USR_NM = #{userName},
PASSWORD = #{password},
ENABLED = #{enabled},
UPT_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE USR_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] updateUser */ INTO TB_ADM_USR ( USR_ID, USR_NM, PASSWORD, ENABLED ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{enabled} )
